io.mosip.registration.service.external

Interface PreRegZipHandlingService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PreRegZipHandlingServiceImpl

    public interface PreRegZipHandlingService
    Handles the pre-registration packet zip files
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    balamurugan ramamoorthy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decryptPreRegPacket(String symmetricKey, byte[] encryptedPacket)
      This method is used to decrypt the pre registration packet using the symmetric key
      PreRegistrationDTO encryptAndSavePreRegPacket(String PreRegistrationId, byte[] preRegPacket)
      This method is used to encrypt the pre registration packet and save it into the disk
      RegistrationDTO extractPreRegZipFile(byte[] preREgZipFile)
      This method is used to extract the pre registration packet zip file and reads the content
      String storePreRegPacketToDisk(String PreRegistrationId, byte[] encryptedPacket)
      This method is used to store the encrypted packet into to the configured disk location

    • Method Detail

      • extractPreRegZipFile

        RegistrationDTO extractPreRegZipFile(byte[] preREgZipFile)
                              throws RegBaseCheckedException
        This method is used to extract the pre registration packet zip file and reads the content
        Parameters:
        preREgZipFile - - the pre registration zip file
        Returns:
        RegistrationDTO - This holds the extracted demographic data and other values
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - - holds the checked exception

      • encryptAndSavePreRegPacket

                                              byte[] preRegPacket)
                                       throws RegBaseCheckedException
        This method is used to encrypt the pre registration packet and save it into the disk
        Parameters:
        PreRegistrationId - - pre registration id
        preRegPacket - - pre reg packet in bytes
        Returns:
        PreRegistrationDTO - pre reg dto holds the pre reg data
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - - holds the checked exceptions

      • storePreRegPacketToDisk

        String storePreRegPacketToDisk(String PreRegistrationId,
                               byte[] encryptedPacket)
                        throws RegBaseCheckedException
        This method is used to store the encrypted packet into to the configured disk location
        Parameters:
        PreRegistrationId - - pre reg id
        encryptedPacket - - pre reg encrypted packet in bytes
        Returns:
        String - pre reg packet file path
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - - holds the checked exceptions

      • decryptPreRegPacket

        byte[] decryptPreRegPacket(String symmetricKey,
                           byte[] encryptedPacket)
        This method is used to decrypt the pre registration packet using the symmetric key
        Parameters:
        symmetricKey - - key to decrypt the pre reg packet
        encryptedPacket - - pre reg encrypted packet in bytes
        Returns:
        byte[] - decrypted pre reg packet
